silver_ring.name: Silver Ring
silver_ring.description: A simple silver band that gleams in the light.

moonstone_amulet.name: Moonstone Amulet
moonstone_amulet.description: An amulet containing a fragment of moonstone that glows softly.

ring_of_power.description: A Legendary ring that amplifies the wearer's magical abilities.

amulet_protection.name: Amulet of Protection
amulet_protection.description: An amulet that grants the wearer additional protection against harm.
